alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 7:10PM CDT until April 17 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Covington County in southeastern Mississippi... Northwestern Lamar County in southeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 710 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Carson, or 13 miles southwest of Collins, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Melba around 725 PM CDT. Sumrall around 735 PM CDT. Sanford around 750 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bassfield and Seminary. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
